issue.title: [Python] Tensor could implement the buffer protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Tensors have an underlying buffer, a data type, shape and strides. It seems like they could implement the Python buffer protocol.
